column4: I am having an issue with that mediatomb can someone tell me why it says "database is locked"
why does my mediatomb say database is locked when I use sudo mediatomb?
What are you trying to accomplish with mediatomb?
You could try ushare. I used it in the past and know for facts that it worked well.
Do try ushare then. It got that DNLA thing for PS3.
Keep it here instead of PMs.  Also, it worked for my Xbox360. First, install ushare then let me know.
This is the channel. :)
That is correct.
When you're done, run "gksudo gedit /etc/ushare.conf" to edit settings.
USHARE_NAME, USHARE_DIR, ENABLE_DLNA.
Just in case, add a new line under DLNA --> USHARE_ENABLE_DLNA=yes
Run this command first --> gksudo gedit /etc/ushare.conf
So you do have ENABLE_DLNA=yes and USHARE_ENABLE_DLNA=yes, right?
ENABLE_DLNA=yes (NEW LINE) USHARE_ENABLE_DLNA=yes
I don't know. It won't hurt to save it now and restart ushare, testing it on PS3.
PS3 -- Well, you should just click on Video or Network and see if the new name show up.
sudo service ushare restart
Correct. That's what UpNp is for. :)
Can you please paste your /etc/ushare.conf ?
Provide me the link.
I found it (sean).
Your laptop/computer? Connected via wifi or wired?
